title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9002.1 - Statement of policy and purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9002.1 - Statement of policy and purpose

State Regulations

The Battery Park City Authority is a body corporate and
politic, constituting a public benefit corporation, established by chapter 343
of the Laws of 1968. This prompt payment policy is adopted pursuant to section
2880
of
the Public Authorities Law, requiring each public benefit corporation to
promulgate rules and regulations detailing its policy with respect to making
prompt payment to contractors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9002.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
